summary: The "World Tourism Organization" (WTO), officially known as the "World Tourism Organisation," is a specialized agency of the United Nations that plays a pivotal role in the global tourism sector. In the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, the WTO provides essential guidelines and standards that influence tourism policies across member states. Its focus on sustainable tourism development aligns with EU objectives to promote economic growth while preserving cultural heritage and environmental integrity.
